simulation_discovery_arc.title: The Simulation Discovery
simulation_discovery_arc.description: The central narrative following the Project 521 team's discovery of evidence that reality is a simulation, and their struggle to understand what this means for humanity.

plotPoints.title: The Martian Capsule
plotPoints.description: Discovery of proto-life and encrypted data during Mars excavation
plotPoints.significance: Inciting incident that begins the entire story

plotPoints.title: Intentional Seeding
plotPoints.description: Team recognizes the proto-life was deliberately sent to the solar system
plotPoints.significance: First major revelation about artificial origins

plotPoints.title: Quantum Consciousness Research
plotPoints.description: Discovery of quantum connections between consciousness and reality manipulation
plotPoints.significance: Bridging discovery between biology and consciousness

plotPoints.title: The Simulation Evidence
plotPoints.description: Overwhelming evidence suggests universe is simulation that consciousness can break
plotPoints.significance: Major plot revelation that changes everything

plotPoints.title: Glitches in Reality
plotPoints.description: Characters begin experiencing reality inconsistencies as awareness grows
plotPoints.significance: Consequences of discovery become personal and dangerous

plotPoints.title: The Choice
plotPoints.description: Characters must decide whether to pursue truth or preserve stability
plotPoints.significance: Final decision point about humanity's future

foundation_conspiracy_arc.title: The Foundation Conspiracy
foundation_conspiracy_arc.description: The shadowy conspiracy led by Aya Stone to control humanity's response to the simulation discovery, using both the Foundation's resources and a consciousness cult.

plotPoints.title: Foundation Learns of Discovery
plotPoints.description: Foundation becomes aware of Project 521 findings through surveillance
plotPoints.significance: Sets up the conspiracy response

plotPoints.title: Project 521 Infiltration Planning
plotPoints.description: Aya plans infiltration to monitor and control dangerous discoveries
plotPoints.significance: Strategic response to contain the threat

plotPoints.title: Vera Chen Joins Project 521
plotPoints.description: Vera integrates into research team as Foundation agent
plotPoints.significance: Inside access to monitor and influence discoveries

plotPoints.title: Consciousness Cult Operations
plotPoints.description: Aya uses her cult to test consciousness control theories
plotPoints.significance: Alternative approach to controlling human consciousness

plotPoints.title: Emergency Response Protocols
plotPoints.description: Foundation accelerates control measures as discovery spreads
plotPoints.significance: Conspiracy moves from covert to overt action

plotPoints.title: The Truth About Control
plotPoints.description: Characters discover the full extent of Foundation manipulation
plotPoints.significance: Revelation of who has been pulling the strings

twin_identity_arc.title: The Washington Twins
twin_identity_arc.description: The parallel journeys of identical twins Sara and Sierra Washington, separated at birth and unknowingly serving opposite sides of the central conflict.

plotPoints.title: Parallel Development
plotPoints.description: Both twins develop similar skills and dedication despite different paths
plotPoints.significance: Establishes the dramatic irony of their opposition

plotPoints.title: Serving Different Masters
plotPoints.description: Sara enforces Foundation control while Sierra protects the research
plotPoints.significance: Direct opposition without awareness

plotPoints.title: Subtle Connections
plotPoints.description: Small clues hint at the connection between the twins
plotPoints.significance: Building toward revelation

plotPoints.title: The Truth Revealed
plotPoints.description: The twins discover each other's existence
plotPoints.significance: Major character revelation and conflict

plotPoints.title: Questioning Everything
plotPoints.description: Both twins question their loyalties and identities
plotPoints.significance: Character growth through identity crisis

plotPoints.title: Choosing Sides
plotPoints.description: The twins must decide whether family or ideology matters more
plotPoints.significance: Resolution of identity and loyalty conflicts

enhancement_ethics_arc.title: The Enhancement Dilemma
enhancement_ethics_arc.description: Elena Vasquez's vision of human genetic optimization conflicts with questions of authenticity and consent, exploring what it means to be human.

plotPoints.title: Genesis Enhancement Programs
plotPoints.description: Elena's genetic modification programs show promise and controversy
plotPoints.significance: Establishes the enhancement vs. authenticity theme

plotPoints.title: Questions of Consent
plotPoints.description: Enhanced individuals begin questioning their modifications
plotPoints.significance: Personal cost of Elena's vision becomes clear

plotPoints.title: The Modified Revolt
plotPoints.description: Enhanced humans develop beyond Elena's control
plotPoints.significance: Consequences of playing with human nature

plotPoints.title: What Makes Us Human?
plotPoints.description: Characters debate whether enhanced consciousness is still authentic
plotPoints.significance: Central philosophical question of the story

consciousness_exploration_arc.title: The Nature of Consciousness
consciousness_exploration_arc.description: A philosophical exploration of what consciousness means, whether it can be simulated, and what makes experience authentic.

plotPoints.title: Studying Awareness
plotPoints.description: Project 521 team researches consciousness and reality connections
plotPoints.significance: Scientific approach to understanding consciousness

plotPoints.title: Consciousness Manipulation
plotPoints.description: Aya's cult experiments with collective consciousness and reality perception
plotPoints.significance: Alternative approach to consciousness study

plotPoints.title: Testing What's Real
plotPoints.description: Characters develop methods to distinguish simulation from reality
plotPoints.significance: Practical application of consciousness theories

plotPoints.title: The Truth About Awareness
plotPoints.description: Major breakthrough in understanding consciousness and simulation
plotPoints.significance: Resolution of central mystery
